function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overlooking the role of urban green spaces in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and limited understanding of effective measures","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies on the role of green spaces in disease transmission and implementing measures to utilize them effectively","Technologies":"Data analytics, GIS mapping, and remote sensing for studying green space utilization","People":"Residents, visitors, and communities in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners, public health organizations, and local government"},{"Description":"Lack of governance and regulation for urban green spaces, particularly in relation to disease mitigation","Impact":"Ineffective management and utilization of green spaces for disease control and public health","Mitigation":"Establishing clear governance structures, regulations, and guidelines for the management of urban green spaces","Technologies":"Smart monitoring systems, IoT devices for crowd management, and environmental sensors for health monitoring","People":"City officials, urban planners, and public health authorities","Owner":"Municipalities, government agencies, and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Limited literature on the role of urban green spaces in disease provision and mitigation, particularly in Latin America","Impact":"Missed opportunities for leveraging green spaces for disease control and public health in Latin American regions","Mitigation":"Conducting targeted research on the role of green spaces in disease provision and mitigation, and promoting knowledge exchange and collaboration among researchers and practitioners","Technologies":"International research collaborations, knowledge sharing platforms, and remote collaboration tools","People":"Researchers, urban planners, and public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, international organizations, and public health agencies"}]}
